org.prebake.service.plan
Class PlanGraph

java.lang.Object
  org.prebake.service.plan.PlanGraph

@ParametersAreNonnullByDefault
public final class PlanGraph
extends java.lang.Object

A directed graph where nodes are Products and an edge exists between to nodes where the source produces outputs that might be inputs to the target.
